subject: [Radiance-general] Sensor points visualiz
body:
Hi Niya,

I think you need to be more clear about what you want to visualize? Do you
want to find the sensor in Radiance's files? Is it related to your question
about annual run with Daysim and you want to see hourly values for a single
sensor during the year?

Mostapha

On Wed, Oct 1, 2014 at 7:59 AM, Todor Syarov <thodor at abv.bg> wrote:
